HOME_DELIVERY.pricing:
GLS Croatia: 5,00 €
Hrvatska pošta (Paket 24): 3,50 €
Besplatna dostava za narudžbe iznad 60,00 €.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time:
GLS: sljedeći radni dan od dana slanja.
Hrvatska pošta: 1-3 radna dana od dana slanja.
HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Dostava putem GLS-a uključuje otoke s popisa. Na otoke koji nisu navedeni u tablici dostava je moguća jedino putem Hrvatske pošte.

express_delivery.delivery_time: Isti dan za Zagreb i Zagrebačku županiju (za narudžbe do 12h radnim danom).

PARCEL_LOCKERS.cod_surcharge: Plaćanje pouzećem nije moguće, isključivo virmanom ili kreditnim karticama.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The webshop offers home delivery, parcel locker delivery, and in-store pickup.
PROVIDERS: Delivery partners are GLS, Hrvatska pošta, and Box Now.
PRICING: Home delivery costs €5.00 (GLS) or €3.50 (Hrvatska pošta). Parcel locker delivery is €2.50 (Box Now). In-store pickup is free. Free shipping is available for orders over €60.
RESTRICTIONS: Cash on delivery is not an option for Box Now parcel lockers. Delivery to certain islands is restricted to Hrvatska pošta.
NOTABLE FEATURES: Same-day delivery to Zagreb and Zagreb County is available via Box Now lockers for orders placed by noon. Saturday delivery is available for parcel lockers. In-store pickup is available every day of the week in Zagreb.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is comprehensive, clearly structured, and easy to locate on the 'Informacije' page. It provides detailed breakdowns of costs, delivery times, and specific conditions for each delivery method, making it very user-friendly.
